markdown:
| icon           = poe2 quill_leaf icon.png
| description    = The leaves of the quill bush are white-green and waxy. When cut, they produce a clear, sweet-smelling fluid prized for its application in medicine, alchemy, and the mundane practice of freshening the air. Each leaf tapers to a fine, rigid point, making the bush a constant hazard for those trudging through the underbrush with exposed legs.
| added_in       = poe2
| equipment_slot = Unequippable
| item_type      = Plant
| item_category  = Ingredient

* 1 can be picked from the [Swamp](/swamp/) staging area.
